sub_title: Global Projects & IT Advisory Lead | CISA | PSM
summary:
As a seasoned IT Leader, mathematician with a track record in the production industry since 2005. I excel at balancing empathy and decisiveness to foster an environment that not only drives but also motivates transformation. I am renowned for my resilience and ability to think outside the box, turning problems into opportunities and challenging the status quo.

My expertise spans IT strategy and governance, program and project management, SAP systems, vendor management, and third-party service management and bridging the gap between technical domains, business, and senior management levels.

As a democratic leader, I value team collaboration and individual growth, leading multicultural teams in complex, distributed environments. My high level of interpersonal skills, cultural awareness, and ability to clearly articulate complex ideas facilitate effective communication.

By marrying strategic analytical skills with project management expertise, I've consistently delivered timely results while providing top-tier service to all stakeholders. I am a firm believer in the value of diversity of thought, and my active support for it coupled with a patient listening ear, allows me to connect effectively with my team and clients.

In my pursuit of career growth, I aim to deploy my expertise in a company that values people development, holds an engaging vision, and leverages IT as a key differentiator. I am passionate about working on cutting-edge projects with professionals keen on overcoming challenges collectively, all the while balancing my professional growth with my personal life. I view every obstacle as a chance for growth and am always prepared to lead with innovation and drive success. 

Skilled in Business Process, IT Controls, IT Service Management, Project Management (Agile, Waterfall), SAP, Oracle CRM, ServiceNow, Microsoft Solutions, and Data Management (including Secure Transfer, GDPR, Data Analytics & BI, Azure Data Lake), and DevOps.

profile_positions.description:
Oversee the organization's IT audit program, ensuring the integrity, reliability, and security of our information systems.
Provide guidance on IT risk management to senior leadership. This role is critical in ensuring that IT systems comply with regulatory standards and effectively meet business needs.

o	Project Assurance and Audit Leadership: Lead IT assurance and audit engagements to assess the adequacy of controls, adherence to policies and procedures, and compliance with applicable regulations. Provide strategic direction to the IT audit team, ensuring effective execution of the IT audit plan.
Governance: Provide IT governance advice to the senior management of the organization.
o	Risk Assessment: Develop and implement a comprehensive risk-based IT audit program. Identify key areas of IT risk within the organization and propose appropriate controls to mitigate these risks.
o	Stakeholder Engagement: Liaise with internal and external stakeholders, including external auditors. Communicate IT audit findings effectively and ensure that audit recommendations are implemented.
o	Continuous Improvement: Stay abreast of developments in IT and auditing, and ensure that the IT audit team is continually upskilled. Champion the use of audit technology and data analytics to improve audit efficiency and effectiveness.
o	Compliance: Monitor compliance with IT policies, procedures, and regulatory requirements. Regularly report on compliance issues and breaches, and recommend improvements.
profile_positions.title: IT Internal Audit Lead
IT Internal Audit Manager
Finance IT Business Process Manager
TME(CRM) Application Manager

profile_positions.title: Chief Technical Officer (CTO)

profile_positions.description:
Led 8 direct and 19 indirect IT specialists (DB architectures, application developers, IS architects, designers, technical writers and testers) on a dedicated IT Software Development project in Turkey.

Project goal was to implement Warehouse Management system integrated with cash system in 11 Hypermarkets in Istanbul (Turkey). 
The primary objective of Warehousing SCM (supply chain management) was to bring together information from disparate sources and put the information into a format that is conducive to making business decisions.
The product flow included the movement of goods from suppliers to customers, customer returns and customers' service needs (orders, return transactions etc.)
 
Project successfully implemented in accordance with the deadlines defined (1 year and 2 month) and followed with efficient post implementation support period (3 months)
profile_positions.title: System Integration Lead

profile_positions.description:
o	Vendor management: Internet service providers, equipment delivery contracts.
o	Provided IT support for customers.
o	Designed and implemented local area network design from the scratch.
o	Successfully Implemented and supported local PABX.
o	Installed, set up and supported OS-based routers and bridges on FreeBSD.
o	Security, maintenance, limitation/distribution/monitoring, automate access to the Internet resources: (IPFW, BIND, Squid, Tcpdump, Apache, Perl, JavaScript, HTML, MySQL, MSSQL).
o	Configured and set up e-mail server (Sendmail)
